title: Looking for a low condition or beater F. Smith Chicago/Boston
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking for a low condition or beater F. Smith Chicago/Boston
posts.post_content: Need help to complete my t206 white sox set. Seeking this card in low condition or beater. Graded or raw. thanks!

I have an SGC 20 Frank Smith.  I am looking for T206's of Larry McLean or Red Kleinow in similar condition, graded by SGC.  Or a couple others I need are T207's of Jack Lapp or Bob Williams in similar condition, graded by SGC.
